item.title: Django: Save Unknown Object in Database
item.description: Suppose you are dealing with a poorly written API, which returns different type of objects at different scenarios. For example, sometimes it returns a string(ie. abcd), sometimes it returns a list(ie. [1,2,3,4]), or maybe None. Now, you are suppose to save that data, which you can’t predict. As you can’t predict the data type of object, you can’t design your Django Model accordingly.

item.title: Implementation of Forgot/Reset Password Feature in Django
item.description: Django has its own implementation for reset/forgot password for its admin site.
